data.eml:eml: A new genus and species of cockroach (Blattida: Phyloblattidae) from the Permian / Triassic boundary beds of Tunguska Basin in eastern Siberia, Russia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Vršanský, Peter (2010): A new genus and species of cockroach (Blattida: Phyloblattidae) from the Permian / Triassic boundary beds of Tunguska Basin in eastern Siberia, Russia. Zootaxa 2353: 55-61, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.275640
